The game is pretty nice, there are new gloves and knives, which are kinda cool. The luck of getting knives in CSGO are increased. The community is good aswell, but in every game there are toxic players. I like when you have Prime Status, than you MOSTLY don't get cheaters in your game. | I recommend this game for people who likes FPS Shooter and Community-Talk. |
